title: Dying Sun Photo
description: Photograph of the dying sun taken by Denton Morris in the distant future.

title: Time Machine
description: The time machine created and used by Denton Morris in his travels through time. Unfortunately, it is not in working order.

title: Denton Morris' Coat
description: The coat worn by Denton Morris on his first trip to the future.

title: Giant Crab Photo
description: Photograph of a giant crab taken by Denton Morris in the distant future.

title: Document #1
description: Document recovered from the museum that Denton Morris encountered in his travels to AD 802,701. Unknown author.

title: Document #2
description: Document recovered from the museum that Denton Morris encountered in his travels to AD 802,701. Unknown author.

title: Document #3
description: Document recovered from the museum that Denton Morris encountered in his travels to AD 802,701. Unknown author.

title: Giant Butterfly
description: Carcass of a giant white butterfly encountered by Denton Morris in his travels to the distant future.

title: Painting of Palace Exterior
description: Painting recovered of the museum that Denton Morris encountered in his travels to AD 802,701. Unknown artist.

title: Photo of Palace Interior
description: Photo taken by Denton Morris of the museum he encountered in his travels to AD 802,701.

title: Time Machine Schematic
description: Original schematics for Denton Morris' time machine. Recovered from his study in the days following his disappearance.

title: White Flower
description: Flower given to Denton Morris by an Eloi that he grew close to on his first trip to AD 802,701.
